#labels Phase-Implementation
Config file example:
{{{
[Paths]
DataPath=..\..\data

[Ogre]
Resources=resources.cfg
Plugins=plugins_debug.cfg
LogFile=../bin/debug/HovercraftUniverse.log

[Sound]
Path=sound\
File=HovSound.fev

[Controls]
Path=controls\
File=Controls.ini

[Player]
PlayerName=UnnamedPlayer
Character=MyCharacter1
Hovercraft=SuperCraft3
}}}

Gebruik in C++ om bv de playername te krijgen:

{{{
#include "Config.h"
std::string myName = Config::getSingletonPtr()->getValue("Player", "PlayerName");
}}}
